column4: NautilNautilus turned into a zombie process, and I can't kill it, even with kill -9. I don't want to restart my computer because I can't start Nautilus. Help.
Do you know how it turned into a zombie process?
no, i was using firefox, downloading stuff, and when i minimized the firefox window to see the desktop, nautilus wasn't there
Sometimes restarting X can get rid of stubborn processes but I have never tried it with zombie processes
